bug.author: rabbit008
bug.summary: The filter button of the intermediate result cannot be clicked
bug.description:
: When I was screening the intermediate results, I found that occasionally the button could not be clicked. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28092647/60702654-16ba4c80-9f32-11e9-8574-0ea8baf45f76.png></denchmark-link>
Brief what process you are following: Click the filter button, without any data, click confirm, will prompt for input data request, close the filter, and then open, there will be a bug that the confirm button cannot be clicked. as above How to reproduce it: Refresh the page nni Environment:
nni version:0.9.1906260743 nni mode(local|pai|remote):local OS:Win10 python version:3.7 is conda or virtualenv used?: is running in docker?:no
need to update document(yes/no): Anything else we need to know:
